function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The spread of COVID-19 due to ineffective suppression measures","Impact":"Increased cases and potential overload of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementing effective social distancing measures and maintaining them until a vaccine becomes available","Technologies":"Disease surveillance and monitoring technologies","People":"Entire population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Negative impact on health systems due to school and university closures","Impact":"Increased absenteeism and potential strain on healthcare resources","Mitigation":"Implementing alternative education and support systems for students and families","Technologies":"Online education platforms, telemedicine","People":"Students, families, healthcare workers","Owner":"Educational institutions, government"},{"Description":"Long-term feasibility and sustainability of suppression measures","Impact":"Uncertain long-term success and potential social and economic costs","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures, research and development of sustainable solutions","Technologies":"Data analysis and predictive modeling, vaccine development","People":"Public health experts, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government"}]}
